title: Lose promo's because guy was about to run in down with bard .
body: After someone banning your champ you will troll ? Well I had to leave champion select cause of Yasuo ban and Bard cleanse smite mid . :) This community is just beautiful .

replies.body: Can always try not banning people's picks..

If you ban someone's champ then you need to be prepared for the risk of doing so before you press that button. While it is 100% allowed for you to ban your own team mates picks, unfortunately most people either don't understand this or take it extremely personally for some reason.

Also I don't quite understand why you left champ select if it was your promos. Even if there was a troll on your team, there is still a chance you can win the game.
It's not Bards fault..  He's a beautiful majestic creature/ person/ celestial thing... And, you know, he's cute. {{champion:432}}
